mapper.select: select count(*) from outline_ where ODescription = #{odescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into outline_ (OID, OTID, TID, ODescription, OData, OFile, OImg, OImg1, OImg2, OImg3, OImg4) values (#{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{otid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{odescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{odata,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ofile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oimg1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oimg2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oimg3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oimg4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
